Context: Button to bring you to Marketplace to add more text fonts.
Displayed in properties panel when a font is created procedurally, e.g. `Bold (procedural)`.
Displayed in properties panel when a font family doesn't contain a weight, e.g. `Thin (unavailable)`.
Context menu item for copying a font family's asset ID to the clipboard
Tooltip for context menu item for copying a font family's asset ID to the clipboard
Source: Copy the asset ID of the family to the clipboard
en-us: Copy the asset ID of the family to the clipboard
